short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for summarizing text using chatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this tool, you can select text and have it summarized with chatGPT in a click. Extension provides a new tab feature as the summarAlze window (optional, upon installing).

I accept and agree to installing the SummarAlze extension and settings to the new tab search on Chrome that will be provided 
by Microsoft bing as per the Terms of Use.
